creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: landscape with wispy grasses in the foreground, thick tree coverage--tall conifers--in the middle ground; and a large green mountain at the back right; a flock of birds populates the sky at upper left; green, browns, and reds dominate the palette; there is one felled tree in the lower left
markings: Red, rectangular seal under signature LLC
signed: Japanese characters in black ink LLC
title: Mount Kinugasa
